field.doc: Auxiliary Sensor #1 output data bytes AUX1_OUT1 through AUX1_OUT6
Auxiliary Sensor #2 output data bytes AUX2_OUT1 through AUX2_OUT6
Reports the number of data packets (ODR cycles) currently stored in the buffer.
field.name: SMP_LEV3_0

register.doc: Reports the status of Auxiliary Sensors AUX1 and AUX2.
register.name: AUX_STATUS

item.doc: Aux1 sensor is waiting to be enabled.
item.name: WAITING_TO_BE_ENABLED

item.doc: Aux1 sensor is waiting to be disabled.
item.name: WAITING_TO_BE_DISABLED

item.doc: Aux2 sensor is waiting to be enabled.
item.name: WAITING_TO_BE_ENABLED

item.doc: Aux2 sensor is waiting to be disabled.
item.name: WAITING_TO_BE_DISABLED

field.doc: Reports logical OR of non-masked interrupt sources sent to INT1
field.name: INT1

field.doc: Wake up event detected on x-axis, negative direction
field.name: INT1_XNWU

field.doc: Wake up event detected on x-axis, positive direction.
field.name: INT1_XPWU

field.doc: Wake up event detected on y-axis, negative direction

field.doc: Wake up event detected on y-axis, positive direction.

field.doc: Wake up event detected on z-axis, negative direction.
field.name: INT1_ZNWU

field.doc: Wake up event detected on z-axis, positive direction.
field.name: INT1_ZPWU

field.doc: Reading this register releases int1 source registers

register.doc: which axis and direction of detected motion can cause an interrupt.
register.name: INT_MASK2

register.doc: This register controls which axis and direction of tap/double tap can cause an interrupt.
register.name: INT_MASK3

register.doc: This register controls which axis and direction of tilt position can cause an interrupt
register.name: INT_MASK4

field.doc: Defines INT2 and SYNC_TRIG pin functionality
field.name: FSYNC_TRIG

item.doc: FSYNC is disabled. SYNC pin is tri-stated.
item.name: disabled

item.doc: FSYNC is enabled. Sync pin is configured as input pin. Buffer is updated in sync with external clock applied at SYNC pin.
item.name: input_ext

item.doc: FSYNC is enabled. Sync pin is configured as input pin. State of SYNC pin is stored in selected sensor's LSB bit.
item.name: input

item.doc: FSYNC is disabled. SYNC pin is configured as output pin.
item.name: output

field.doc: This register sets the threshold for Back-to-sleep (motion detect) interrupt.
This register contains additional bits for BTS and WUF threshold.
This register sets the Active Threshold for wake-up (motion detect) interrupt.
This register sets the time motion must be present before a wake-up interrupt is set.
This register sets the time motion must be present before a Back-to-sleep interrupt is set.

item.doc: Absolute threshold. ASIC compares current output to threshold.
item.name: ABSOLUTE_THRESHOLD

item.doc: Relative threshold. ASIC compares difference between current output and previous output to threshold.
item.name: RELATIVE_THRESHOLD

item.doc: Counter is cleared once activity level is outside the threshold.
item.name: COUNTER_CLEAR

item.doc: Counter is decremented by one when activity level is outside the threshold.
item.name: COUNTER_DECREMENT

field.doc: sets the Output Data Rate for the Wake-up (motion detection).
field.name: OWUF

field.doc: sets the Output Data Rate for the Back to Sleep (BTS).
field.name: OBTS

field.doc: Defines control bit polarity for aux2 enable/disable command sequences.
field.name: AUX_CTL_POL2

field.doc: Defines control bit polarity for aux1 enable/disable command sequences.
field.name: AUX_CTL_POL1

field.doc: Read/Write that should be used to store the SAD for auxiliary I2C device 1.
Read/Write that should be used to store the starting data register address for auxiliary I2C device 1.
Register address for enable/disable control register for auxiliary I2C device 1.
Defines bits to toggle in the control register for auxiliary I2C device 1.

register.doc: Defines register read controls for auxiliary I2C device.
register.name: AUX_I2C_ODR

field.doc: Number of bytes read back via Auxiliary I2C bus from device
field.name: AUX1_D

field.doc: Determines rate at which aux1 output is polled by ASIC in aux
field.name: AUX1ODR

field.doc: Read/Write that should be used to store the SAD for auxiliary I2C device 2.
Read/Write that should be used to store the starting data register address for auxiliary I2C device 2.
Register address for enable/disable control register for auxiliary I2C device 2.
Defines bits to toggle in the control register for auxiliary I2C device 2.

register.doc: Defines register read controls for auxiliary I2C device.
register.name: AUX_I2C_ODR2

field.doc: Number of bytes read back via Auxiliary I2C bus from device
field.name: AUX2_D

field.doc: Determines rate at which aux1 output is polled by ASIC in aux
field.name: AUX2ODR

field.doc: This register sets the Hysteresis that is placed in between the Screen Rotation states.
This register sets the high level threshold for tilt angle detection.
This register sets the high level threshold for tilt angle detection.
This register sets the high level threshold for tilt angle detection.

register.doc: This register sets the high level threshold for tilt angle detection.
register.name: TILT_TAP_ODR

register.doc: This register is responsible for enabling/disabling reporting of Tap/Double Tap
register.name: TDTRC

field.doc: This register contains counter information for the detection of a double tap event.
This register represents the 8-bit jerk high threshold to determine if a tap is detected.
This register represents the 8-bit (0d– 255d) jerk low threshold to determine if a tap is detected.
This register contains counter information for the detection of any tap event.
This register contains counter information for the detection of a double tap event.
This register contains counter information for the detection of a tap event.
This register contains counter information for the detection of single and double taps.
initiates software reset, which performs the RAM reboot routine.
field.name: SRST

field.doc: Active high gyroscope fast start sensor enable
field.name: GYRO_FSTART

item.doc: Gyro fast start function is disabled.
item.name: DISABLED

item.doc: Gyro fast start function is enabled.
item.name: ENABLED

field.doc: Read/write control register that controls the buffer sample threshold.
field.name: SMP_TH13_0

field.doc: Read/write control register that controls the buffer sample threshold.
field.name: SMP_TH11_4

register.doc: Read/write control register that controls sample buffer input
register.name: BUF_CTL1

register.doc: Read/write control register that controls aux1 and aux2 buffer input
register.name: BUF_CTL2

register.doc: Read/write control register that controls sample buffer operation
register.name: BUF_EN

field.doc: controls activation of the sample buffer.
field.name: BUFE

field.doc: Active high buffer times stamp enable.
field.name: BUF_TIME_EN

field.doc: selects the operating mode of the sample buffer
field.name: BUF_M

item.doc: The buffer collects 4096 bytes of data until full, collecting new data only when the buffer is not full.
item.name: FIFO

item.doc: The buffer holds the last 4096 bytes of data. Once the buffer is full, the oldest data is discarded to make room for newer data.
item.name: STREAM

item.doc: When a trigger event occurs (logic high input on TRIG pin), the buffer holds the last data set of SMP[11:0] samples
item.name: TRIGGER

field.doc: reports the status of the buffer’s trigger function if this mode has been selected.
field.name: BUF_TRIG

field.doc: Latched buffer status information and the entire buffer contents are cleared when a non-zero value is written to this register
Data in the buffer can be read by executing this command.
